exceptions.exn: The reference eps was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros u l H. unfold is_LimInf_seq. intros eps. destruct l. - specialize (H eps). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n Hn. destruct (H n Hn) as [N' [H1 H2]]. exists N'. split. + apply H1. + apply H2. - specialize (H 0). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n Hn. destruct (H n Hn) as [N' [H1 H2]]. exists N'. split. + apply H1. + apply H2.
